!function() {
  var t = window.driftt = window.drift = window.driftt || [];
  if (!t.init) {
    if (t.invoked) return void (window.console && console.error && console.error("Drift snippet included twice."));
    t.invoked = !0, t.methods = [ "identify", "config", "track", "reset", "debug", "show", "ping", "page", "hide", "off", "on" ], 
    t.factory = function(e) {
      return function() {
        var n = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
        return n.unshift(e), t.push(n), t;
      };
    }, t.methods.forEach(function(e) {
      t[e] = t.factory(e);
    }), t.load = function(t) {
      var e = 3e5, n = Math.ceil(new Date() / e) * e, o = document.createElement("script");
      o.type = "text/javascript", o.async = !0, o.crossorigin = "anonymous", o.src = "https://js.driftt.com/include/" + n + "/" + t + ".js";
      var i = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
      i.parentNode.insertBefore(o, i);
    };
  }
}();

           <ul class="m-product__list m-default__list">

   <div class="wrapper__content">
    <section class="s-hero-2021" data-play-visible="1">
     <div class="slides">
      <div class="slides-item">
       <div class="slides-item__bg" style="background-color:#ffffff;">
        <div class="slides-item__bg-desktop">
         <div class="c-media type-video">
          <video autoplay="" class="c-video" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/HOMEPAGE-3840x1920-v2-lighter.mp4">
          </video>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="slides-item__bg-mobile">
         <div class="c-media type-video">
          <video autoplay="" class="c-video" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/HOMEPAGE-M-800x1400-lighter.mp4">
          </video>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="container">
        <div class="c-text_with_media media-position-right media-position-mobile-bottom">
         <div class="text-holder">
          <h2 class="c-title-h2 c-title" style="color:">
           Powering Any Video Experience
          </h2>
          <div class="c-text">
           <p>
            Driving communication, learning, and TV experiences for millions of users daily
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="c-buttons">
           <a class="btn btn-primary c-button" href="https://corp.kaltura.com/company/contact/" id="c-button-15445" style="border-radius:6px;" target="">
            Let's Chat!
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="media-holder">
          <div class="media-desktop">
           <div class="c-media type-image">
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="media-mobile">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="slides-item">
       <div class="slides-item__bg" style="background-color:;">
        <div class="slides-item__bg-desktop">
         <div class="c-media type-video">
          <video autoplay="" class="c-video kl-lazy" data-src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/virtual_events_3840.mp4" loop="" muted="" playsinline="">
          </video>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="slides-item__bg-mobile">
         <div class="c-media type-video">
          <video autoplay="" class="c-video kl-lazy" data-src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/virtual_events_mobile-x2.mp4" loop="" muted="" playsinline="">
          </video>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="container">
        <div class="c-text_with_media media-position-right media-position-mobile-bottom">
         <div class="text-holder">
          <h1 class="c-title-h1 c-title" style="color:">
           Virtual Events and Online Communities
          </h1>
          <div class="c-text">
           <p>
            Powering unique branded virtual events for any audience size.
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="c-buttons">
           <style>
            #c-button-527577 { background-color: #282828; border-color: transparent; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 6px; } #c-button-527577:hover { background-color: #ffffff; border-color: transparent; color: #000000; }
           </style>
           <a class="btn btn-custom c-button" href="https://corp.kaltura.com/virtual-events-demo-request/" id="c-button-527577" style="border-radius:6px;" target="">
            Request a Demo
           </a>
           <style>
            #c-button-594852 { background-color: transparent; border-color: #282828; color: #282828; border-radius: 6px; } #c-button-594852:hover { background-color: transparent; border-color: #ffffff; color: #ffffff; }
           </style>
           <a class="btn btn-custom c-button" href="https://corp.kaltura.com/virtual-events/" id="c-button-594852" style="border-radius:6px;" target="">
            Explore More
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="media-holder">
          <div class="media-desktop">
           <div class="c-media type-image">
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="media-mobile">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="slides-item">
       <div class="slides-item__bg" style="background-color:;">
        <div class="slides-item__bg-desktop">
         <div class="c-media type-video">
          <video autoplay="" class="c-video kl-lazy" data-src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/cloud-tv-_1920-1.mp4" loop="" muted="" playsinline="">

       </div>
       <div class="container">

    <section class="s-media-text-list-2021 layout-media_list lg-align-center media-position-left media-position-mobile-top" id="why-kaltura" style="margin-top:vh;">
     <style>
      #c-background-351361 { align-items: flex-end; justify-content: center; }
     </style>
     <div class="c-background" id="c-background-351361">
      <div class="c-background-drawer" style="background-color:#fafafa;">
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="container">
      <div class="media-holder">
       <div class="main c-media type-image">
        <img alt="" class="c-image" data-lazy-src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/group-35.png" height="615" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20841%20615'%3E%3C/svg%3E" srcset="" width="841"/>
        <noscript>
         <img alt="" class="c-image" height="615" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/group-35.png" srcset="" width="841"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="text-holder">
       <h2 class="title">
        Why Customers Love Kaltura?
       </h2>
       <div class="list">
        <div class="list__item">
         Were inspired by our customers ideas and are fun to work with
        </div>
        <div class="list__item">
         Our products are loved and trusted by the worlds top organizations
        </div>
        <div class="list__item">
         We have the broadest video technology stack: Real-time, Live, VOD
        </div>
        <div class="list__item">
         Our accessible products drive engagement and interactivity for all
        </div>
        <div class="list__item">
         Our video cloud platform is designed for unlimited scale
        </div>
        <div class="list__item">
         We build everything on our video APIs, and many tech companies use them too
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-buttons">
        <a class="btn btn-primary c-button" href="https://corp.kaltura.com/video-collaboration-communication/enterprise-video-portal/free-trial/" id="c-button-77772" style="border-radius:6px;" target="">
         Sign Up for Free
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="s-resource-slider-2021">
     <div class="container">
      <h2 class="c-title-h2 text-center section-title c-title" style="color:#282828">
       Other resources you might be interested in:
      </h2>
      <div class="items-slider carousel">
       <div class="items-slider__item">
        <div class="items-slider__item-inner">
         <a class="items-slider__item-image" href="https://corp.kaltura.com/resources/the-state-of-video-in-education-2020/">

instanceof Constructor))throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function")}var RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker=function(){function _createClass(RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker,[{key:"_checkPassiveOption",value:function(self){try{var options={get passive(){return!(self.passiveSupported=!0)}};window.addEventListener("test",null,options),window.removeEventListener("test",null,options)}catch(err){self.passiveSupported=!1}}},{key:"initRequestIdleCallback",value:function(){!1 in window&&(window.requestIdleCallback=function(cb){var start=Date.now();return setTimeout(function(){cb({didTimeout:!1,timeRemaining:function(){return Math.max(0,50-(Date.now()-start))}})},1)}),!1 in window&&(window.cancelIdleCallback=function(id){return clearTimeout(id)})}},{key:"isDataSaverModeOn",value:function(){return"connection"in navigator&&!0===navigator.connection.saveData}},{key:"supportsLinkPrefetch",value:function(){var elem=document.createElement("link");return elem.relList&&elem.relList.supports&&elem.relList.supports("prefetch")&&window.IntersectionObserver&&"isIntersecting"in navigator.connection&&("2g"===navigator.connection.effectiveType||"slow-2g"===navigator.connection.effectiveType)}}]),RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker}();
  </script>
  <script id="rocket-delay-js-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function() {
"use strict";var e=function(){function n(e,t){for(var r=0;r<t.length;r++){var n=t[r];n.enumerable=n.enumerable||!1,n.configurable=!0,"value"in n&&(n.writable=!0),Object.defineProperty(e,n.key,n)}}return function(e,t,r){return t&&n(e.prototype,t),r&&n(e,r),e}}();function n(e,t){if(!(e instanceof t))throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function")}var t=function(){function r(e,t){n(this,r),this.attrName="data-rocketlazyloadscript",this.browser=t,this.options=this.browser.options,this.triggerEvents=e,this.userEventListener=this.triggerListener.bind(this)}return e(r,[{key:"init",value:function(){this._addEventListener(this)}},{key:"reset",value:function(){this._removeEventListener(this)}},{key:"_addEventListener",value:function(t){this.triggerEvents.forEach(function(e){return window.addEventListener(e,t.userEventListener,t.options)})}},{key:"_removeEventListener",value:function(t){this.triggerEvents.forEach(function(e){return window.removeEventListener(e,t.userEventListener,t.options)})}},{key:"_loadScriptSrc",value:function(){var r=this,e=document.querySelectorAll("script["+this.attrName+"]");0!==e.length&&Array.prototype.slice.call(e).forEach(function(e){var t=e.getAttribute(r.attrName);e.setAttribute("src",t),e.removeAttribute(r.attrName)}),this.reset()}},{key:"triggerListener",value:function(){this._loadScriptSrc(),this._removeEventListener(this)}}],[{key:"run",value:function(){RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker&&new r(["keydown","mouseover","touchmove","touchstart","wheel"],new RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker({passive:!0})).init()}}]),r}();t.run();
}());
  </script>
  <script defer="" id="js.cookie-js" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/themes/kaltura/resources/js/legacy/vendor/js.cookie.min.js?ver=5.7" type="text/javascript">

  <script id="kaltura-2020-js-js-extra" type="text/javascript">
   /* <![CDATA[ */

/* ]]> */
  </script>
  <script defer="" id="kaltura-2020-js-js" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/themes/kaltura/dist/js/theme.min.js?ver=1616345784001" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script defer="" id="wp-embed-js" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-includes/js/wp-embed.min.js?ver=5.7" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script>
   window.lazyLoadOptions={elements_selector:"img[data-lazy-src],.rocket-lazyload",data_src:"lazy-src",data_srcset:"lazy-srcset",data_sizes:"lazy-sizes",class_loading:"lazyloading",class_loaded:"lazyloaded",threshold:300,callback_loaded:function(element){if(element.tagName==="IFRAME"&&element.dataset.rocketLazyload=="fitvidscompatible"){if(element.classList.contains("lazyloaded")){if(typeof window.jQuery!="undefined"){if(jQuery.fn.fitVids){jQuery(element).parent().fitVids()}}}}}};window.addEventListener('LazyLoad::Initialized',function(e){var lazyLoadInstance=e.detail.instance;if(window.MutationObserver){var observer=new MutationObserver(function(mutations){var image_count=0;var iframe_count=0;var rocketlazy_count=0;mutations.forEach(function(mutation){for(i=0;i<mutation.addedNodes.length;i++){if(typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName!=='function'){continue}
if(typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName!=='function'){continue}
images=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('img');is_image=mutation.addedNodes[i].tagName=="IMG";iframes=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('iframe');is_iframe=mutation.addedNodes[i].tagName=="IFRAME";rocket_lazy=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName('rocket-lazyload');image_count+=images.length;iframe_count+=iframes.length;rocketlazy_count+=rocket_lazy.length;if(is_image){image_count+=1}
if(is_iframe){iframe_count+=1}}});if(image_count>0||iframe_count>0||rocketlazy_count>0){lazyLoadInstance.update()}});var b=document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];var config={childList:!0,subtree:!0};observer.observe(b,config)}},!1)
  </script>
  <script async="" data-no-minify="1" src="https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/plugins/wp-rocket/assets/js/lazyload/16.1/lazyload.min.js">
  </script>
  <script async="" defer="" src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js">
  </script>

   var templateUrl = "https://corp.kaltura.com/wp-content/themes/kaltura";
    var homeUrl = "https://corp.kaltura.com";
    var pageID = "72128";

  <script>
   "use strict";var wprRemoveCPCSS=function wprRemoveCPCSS(){var elem;document.querySelector('link[data-rocket-async="style"][rel="preload"]')?setTimeout(wprRemoveCPCSS,200):(elem=document.getElementById("rocket-critical-css"))&&"remove"in elem&&elem.remove()};window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener("load",wprRemoveCPCSS):window.attachEvent&&window.attachEvent("onload",wprRemoveCPCSS);
  </script>
